issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

epic.name: Android: Camera Bugs
epic.summary: Android: Address deficiencies in the Camera implementation

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Android: camera returns low resolution image using overlay
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK 3.0.0.v20121113170203
--
Samsung Galaxy Nexus (4.1)
ZTE N860 (2.3.5)

comments.body:
Please format the code or use http://pastie.org.

What do you get with event.rect ?

overlay used, height:480, width: 640
Any update on this issue? It makes it impossible to have a customized camera-based app on Android, which is currently a very popular style of app. BTW, I'm still seeing this on 3.2.0.v20130614230533.

Titanium SDK version: 3.1.2 (08/06/13 10:45 78d4077) = 3.1.2 RC2

Nexus 4, Android 4.3
